name: Nosferatu
languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.Regeneration: The nosferatu regains 10 hit points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight. If the nosferatu takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function until the start of the nosferatu's next turn.
traits.Spider Climb: The nosferatu can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
traits.Sunlight Hypersensitivity: The nosferatu takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

actions.Multiattack: The nosferatu makes two Claw attacks followed by one Bite attack. If both Claw attacks hit the same creature, the Bite attack is made with advantage.
actions.Claw: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d6 + 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d6 + 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. If the target is missing any of its hit points, it instead takes 11 (2d10) necrotic damage.
actions.Blood Disgorge (Recharge 5xe2x80x936): The nosferatu vomits blood in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16+1d6 + 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 (4d8) necrotic damage, and it can't regain hit points for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage with no additional effects.
